00018 //Own includes
00019 #include "cprintitemlist.h"

00022 #include <qstring.h>

00025 #include <klocale.h>
00026 
00027 CPrintItemList::CPrintItemList( ListCPrintItem* items,  QWidget *parent, const char *name ) : KListView(parent,name) {
00028     m_items = items;
00029     initView();
00030     
00031     insertItems(m_items);
00032 }
00033 
00034 CPrintItemList::~CPrintItemList(){
00035     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00036         if (m_items->current())
00037             m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00038     }   
00039 }
00040 
00042 void CPrintItemList::initView(){
00043     setAllColumnsShowFocus(true);
00044     addColumn(i18n("Module"),-1);
00045     addColumn(i18n("From"), -1);
00046     addColumn(i18n("To"), -1);  
00047     addColumn(i18n("Style"), -1);   
00048     
00049     setSelectionMode( QListView::Extended );
00050 }
00051 
00053 void CPrintItemList::insertItems( ListCPrintItem* itemList ) {
00054     const bool sameList = (itemList == m_items);
00055     for(itemList->last(); itemList->current(); itemList->prev() ) {
00056         if (!sameList)
00057             m_items->append(itemList->current());
00058         itemList->current()->listViewItem(this);    //insert the QListViewItem into the list
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00063 void CPrintItemList::setItems( ListCPrintItem* itemList ){
00064     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00065         if (m_items->current())
00066             m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00067     }
00068     insertItems( itemList );
00069 }
00070 
00072 void CPrintItemList::deleteSelectedItems(){
00073     QPtrList<QListViewItem> items = selectedItems();    
00074     if (!items.count())
00075         return;
00076     const bool autoDelete = items.autoDelete();
00077     
00078     CPrintItem* p = 0;
00079     for (items.first(); items.current(); items.next()) {
00080         if ( CPrintItem::ListViewItem* item = dynamic_cast<CPrintItem::ListViewItem*>(items.current()) ) {
00081             if (!(p = item->printItem()))
00082                 continue;
00083             if (int pos = m_items->findRef(p))
00084         m_items->take(pos);
00085             p->deleteListViewItem();
00086             if (!autoDelete)
00087                 delete p;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00093 void CPrintItemList::moveUp(){
00094     QPtrList<QListViewItem> items = selectedItems();
00095     for (items.first(); items.current(); items.next()) {
00096         QListViewItem* current = items.current();
00097         if (current && current->itemAbove() &&  current->itemAbove()->itemAbove()) {
00098             current->moveItem( current->itemAbove()->itemAbove() );
00099         }
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00104 void CPrintItemList::moveDown(){
00105     QPtrList<QListViewItem> items = selectedItems();
00106     for (items.last(); items.current(); items.prev()) {
00107         QListViewItem* current = items.current();
00108         if (current && current->itemBelow()) {
00109             current->moveItem( current->itemBelow() );
00110         }
00111     }
00112 }
00113 
00115 void CPrintItemList::applyStyleToSelected( CStyle* style){
00116     CPrintItem* printItem;
00117     CPrintItem::ListViewItem* item;
00118     QPtrList<QListViewItem> list = selectedItems();
00119     for ( QListViewItem* i = list.first(); i; i = list.next()) {
00120         if ((item = dynamic_cast<CPrintItem::ListViewItem*>(i))) {
00121             printItem = item->printItem();
00122             printItem->setStyle(style);
00123             printItem->updateListViewItem();
00124         }
00125     }
00126 }
